about_the_game:
The Source is a unique modern take on the classic Text Adventure genre. An outsider to a foreign world, you must choose a kingdom to help gain an ancient power locked deep beneath a mysterious Well. Explore each kingdom, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery surrounding this shattered world.




Explore a vast and interconnected world filled with secrets...



Your choices will radically affect the story and gameplay. Choose wisely, our fate is in your hands...




I believe in making games that as many people as possible to enjoy, and for this reason the game will include a large amount of accessibility options so you are as comfortable playing the game as possible.
  • Contrast adjustments (gamma)
  • Reduce or remove background particles
  • Change the game font to make it easier to read
  • Change the colour of the text to make it easier to read
  • Reduce or turn off text animations
  • Turn off screen shake effects
All Of This and More to Come!!!


You can play the Demo RIGHT NOW!!! As the game continues to be developed, the Demo will be updated periodically to reflect the best experience possible!


Are you interested in the game? Do you want updates on the development? Join the Official Discord Server and become a part of our growing community! The link is in the sidebar!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra
  • Processor: Apple Silicon chip recommended, but the game should work on Intel Processors to some degree.
  • Additional Notes: Modern personal computers should be able to run the game with little to no problem. Graphics settings are available in-game to allow better performance on older devices as needed.
